affiliation.ja: 公益財団法人九州大学学術研究都市推進機構

profile.ja:
1957(昭32)年7月 福岡市生まれ
1981(昭56)年3月 九州大学工学部生産機械工学科卒業
1983(昭58)年3月 九州大学大学院工学研究科生産機械工学専攻修士課程修了
1986(昭61)年3月 同 上 機械工学専攻博士後期課程単位修得退学
1986(昭61)年4月 九州大学講師(工学部機械工学科蒸気工学講座)
1986(昭61)年5月 工学博士
1988(昭63)年4月 九州大学助教授( 同 上 )
1994(平 5)年4月 機械系学科改組に伴い機械エネルギー工学科伝熱工学講座に配置換
(1994(平 5)年4月～1995(平 6)3月 カナダ・アルバータ大学機械工学科客員研究員)
1999(平11)年4月 機械系学科改組に伴い大学院工学研究科機械科学専攻熱工学講座（伝熱工学）に配置換
2000(平12)年4月 教官組織の変更に伴い大学院工学研究院機械科学部門熱工学講座（伝熱工学）に配置換
2005(平17)年4月 熱工学講座の組織替えにより，所属研究室名称が「伝熱工学」から「熱物質移動」に変更
2007(平19)年10月 新キャンパス計画推進室（兼任）
(財)九州大学学術研究都市推進機構 企業立地コアリサーチャー（兼任）
2008(平20)年4月 機械科学部門・知能機械システム部門の改組により，機械工学部門熱工学講座に所属変更
2009(平21)年10月 (財)九州大学学術研究都市推進機構 研究主幹（昇任）
2009(平21)年10月 大学院工学研究院教授（機械工学部門を離れ，工学研究院長付）
新キャンパス計画推進室教授（兼任）
現在に至る

paper_title.ja: E122 フィン付回転ドラムの強制対流熱伝達 : 矩形管内流れとの相似性に関する考察
paper_title.en: Forced Convective Heat Transfer from a Rotating Drum with Fin Array : Consideration on the Similarity with Flow in a Rectangular Channel

description.ja: A study on forced convective heat transfer from a rotating drum with fin array to air is performed to improve the heat removal performance from the ECB retarder. Based on a hypothesis that the heat transfer mechanism consists of the cavity flow over the fin tops and the channel flow passing through the fins, the data obtained in the previous report for the rectangular channel flow, which was made by closing the top side of the channel with aluminum tape, are correlated with taking the similarity with the 'usual' channel flow ito account. Finally a semi-empirical equation of the rectangular channel flow for this system is proposed.
description.en: A study on forced convective heat transfer from a rotating drum with fin array to air is performed to improve the heat removal performance from the ECB retarder. Based on a hypothesis that the heat transfer mechanism consists of the cavity flow over the fin tops and the channel flow passing through the fins, the data obtained in the previous report for the rectangular channel flow, which was made by closing the top side of the channel with aluminum tape, are correlated with taking the similarity with the 'usual' channel flow ito account. Finally a semi-empirical equation of the rectangular channel flow for this system is proposed.

paper_title.ja: Merits and Demerits of Introductory Subjects on Mechanical Engineering Education for Freshmen in Kyushu University
paper_title.en: Merits and Demerits of Introductory Subjects on Mechanical Engineering Education for Freshmen in Kyushu University

description.ja: While a reform of the university education conscious of JABEE examination progresses in the universities in Japan, an enforcement of the introductory subject for freshmen to the faculty of engineering is going on. This paper reports on an introductory design subject entitled "A Guide to Engineering", which has been offered the freshmen of the Department of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering, Kyushu University for three years. The background under which this subject was planed to set up is described at the beginning. Next, the outline of the subject and proceeding of the class are shown with taking the author's class as an example. After being shown the educational effects and the problems with the results of questionnaire survey obtained from both the students and the professors, merits and demerits to offer this type of introductory subject to the freshmen are discussed. Finally, he conclusion that introducing this type of introductory subject to the education program for mechanical engineering is very effective to improve achievement of the students in Japanese universities is conducted.
description.en: While a reform of the university education conscious of JABEE examination progresses in the universities in Japan, an enforcement of the introductory subject for freshmen to the faculty of engineering is going on. This paper reports on an introductory design subject entitled "A Guide to Engineering", which has been offered the freshmen of the Department of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering, Kyushu University for three years. The background under which this subject was planed to set up is described at the beginning. Next, the outline of the subject and proceeding of the class are shown with taking the author's class as an example. After being shown the educational effects and the problems with the results of questionnaire survey obtained from both the students and the professors, merits and demerits to offer this type of introductory subject to the freshmen are discussed. Finally, he conclusion that introducing this type of introductory subject to the education program for mechanical engineering is very effective to improve achievement of the students in Japanese universities is conducted.
